content: amigurumi tiger pattern by a little love everyday you can find the free pattern from my website https //littleloveeveryday com/amigurumi-tiger-pattern/ this pdf pattern for amigurumi tiger is written in us crochet terms and available in english skill level intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - increase - invisible decrease - invisible fasten_off - slip_stitch materials you will need - sport weight cotton yarn in orange black and white - 2 mm crochet hook or the size you need depending on yarn you use - polyester stuffing - 8 mm safety eyes/ flat back eyes - tapestry needle - black embroidery thread size the finished doll measures around 4 3 inches tall and 2 5 inches wide you are welcome to use any yarn of different thickness the sizes may vary according to the yarn and hook you use hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute little tiger as much as i did please note this is an ad-free pdf version with step by step pictures of pattern that can be found for free on my blog to view the free version go to www littleloveeveryday com >> this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to share publish resell distribute or rewrite this pattern in any way >> you may sell items made from this pattern but please give me a credit as the designer and include a link to this pattern
